page.title: 08Shoreham Beach Infant Schl.
page.content: in 1981 and has been there for 4 years now. The Deputy Head started teaching in 1963 in London and then moved here in 1975 and has been teaching ever since. When the headmistress ever takes on any new staff full-time or part-time she makes sure they have a good personality and the determination to work hard. At the end of every term the children's work is displayed neatly in classrooms for the parents to see when they visit the school. There are no set rules for punishment except if kicking occurs the pupils' shoes are removed for the rest of the day.If serious problems occur parents are brought in. The school would not like to expand a lot but perhaps keep one room open for very young children and treat it
